name: Giblin Gate
description:
A "Slay The Spire" inspired card game where you defeat monsters.

Pick your game mode, character, and play cards!

Programmed in GDIM 32 @ UCI

**known issues as of 3/19:

- music settings only work upon initial start

- player has to manually end monster turn

Programmers

Nicolas Assakura Miyazaki (TheBananaSlug)

Bao-tran Nancy Duong (6oymilk)

Tyler Wang (TylerGW)

Joseph Liu (jliucat)

Assets Used:

background || character sprites || enemy sprites || cards || music
